<!--- NOTE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED, IF YOU ARE READING THIS, YOU ARE EDITING THE WRONG FILE --->
**usbtool**: https://github.com/jakeogh/usbtool
### Installation:

#### Debian 11

    1. sudo apt-get install python3-pip -y

    2. pip install --force-reinstall git+https://git@github.com/jakeogh/usbtool

    3. source ~/.profile

### Examples:
```
$ usbtool find-device --help
Usage: usbtool find-device [OPTIONS]

Options:
  --command-hex TEXT
  --response-hex TEXT
  --usb-id TEXT
  --serial-number TEXT
  --manufacturer TEXT
  --data-dir DIRECTORY  [default: /home/user/.usbtool/2025_03_28]
  --baud-rate INTEGER   [default: 9600]
  --log-serial-data
  --timeout INTEGER     [default: 1]
  --verbose
  --dict
  --verbose-inf
  --help                Show this message and exit.

$ usbtool find-device --baud-rate 921600 --command-hex 100253411003 --response-hex 065341
serial_url='spy:///dev/ttyUSB0?file=/dev/null'
_tx_bytes=b'\x10\x02SA\x10\x03'
_bytes_read=b'' _expected_rx_bytes=b'\x06SA'
```
